short_summary: Social Rehabilitation Services for Prisoners, Correctional Service of Canada, Ontario, Canada
description: This Contract includes the delivery of social rehabilitation services for prisoners from the estimated date of contract award to March 31, 2023, with the option of an additional year.
full_summary:
**Advance Contract Award Notice: Circle of Support and Accountability**

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01017075
**Solicitation Number:** 4274502
**Publication Date:** December 13, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 23, 2022, 13:00:00
**Region of Interest:** Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
**Region of Delivery:** Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
 
**Contracting Entity:**
Correctional Service of Canada
340 Laurier Avenue West, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1P 0P9
 
**Contact Information:**
Lake, Elizabeth (elizabeth.lake@csc-scc.gc.ca)
Phone: 613-328-9647
 
**Objective:**
The Correctional Service of Canada invites qualified contractors to provide Social Rehabilitation Services for Prisoners through a Circle of Support and Accountability.

**Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

**Notice Details:**
Please be advised that the subject tender is no longer accepting bids.

**Export Controls or Trade Agreements:** Not applicable

**Support Materials:**
Tender documents are available in English and French at the following links:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/13/06871a201e92504d9fed82997248367c/cosa_acan_en_english_final.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/13/d6f8b7282854b52e19af6d626daef09b/cosa_pac_-_fr_-_final.pdf

 
**Evaluation Criteria:**

Note: The evaluation criteria for this bid are not specified in the provided information.

**Award Information:**
A contract has been awarded to [contractor's name]. Further information regarding this award can be found at [Government website].

**Technical Information:**
For more information regarding the Circle of Support and Accountability, please consult the technical description provided in the supporting documents.

Note: The provided information may still be sanitized and redacted according to government standards.  Additional information may not be made available at this time.   It is the responsibility of interested contractors to review further supporting materials for full clarity. 

Original contract text references were used.  Write-ups regarding required language (russian) or document coding, formats or other language-specific coding preferences are not applicable in the created output with requested word limit
